tool.name: ecomet_24_seasons_nmds
tool.description: Perform Nonmetric Multidimensional Scaling (NMDS) for the seasons on the data from the MTBLS520 study.

data.name: outfile1
data.label: Goodness of Fit and Shepard Plot for Seasons NMDS

data.name: outfile2
data.label: Procrustes analysis for original and fitted Seasons NDMS

tool.help: This is the MTBLS520 study. The study will be published soon. This code is work-in-progress. Do not redistribute unless study published. Copyright (C) 2017 Kristian Peters - IPB Halle ---- More updates soon
